# SOUP Inventory

| Library | Version | Source | Safety Relevance | Justification |
|----------|----------|--------|------------------|----------------|
| TailwindCSS | 4.x | npm | Low | Styling only |
| Vite | 5.x | npm | Low | Build tool |
| Node.js | 20.x | External | High | Runtime for backend |
| @tailwindcss/postcss | 4.x | npm | Low | Build-time only |
| Google Maps API | External | Medium | Visualization dependency |

**SBOM:** Automatically generated as `sbom.json` in CI.
